channel.title: Yan Holtz Homepage
channel.description: Yan Holtz's blog on statistics, R and Dataviz

item.title: From Data to Viz - A classification of graphics based on input data format
item.description: From Data to Viz is a classification of chart types based on input data format. It comes in the form of a decision tree leading to a set of potentially appropriate visualizations to represent the dataset.

item.title: Pimp my R-Markdown
item.description: R markdown creates interactive reports from R code. Iâ€™ve created a document that provides a few tips I use on a daily basis to improve the appearance of my html outputs.
